Class GameBridge

java.lang.Object
visualization.view.GameBridge
public class GameBridge extends Object
GameBridge connects the Game logic with the JavaFX UI. It monitors the game state and notifies listeners when the game is completed.

    • isGameCompleted

      private boolean isGameCompleted()
      Checks if the game is completed by examining if all bulbs are lit.
      Returns:
      true if all bulbs are lit, false otherwise
